featured.text: Now that we all use pencils, doodling is on the increase, and the quality of pencilwomanship is impressive, as you can tell from my handwriting in this letter.
All we hear is the scratching of pencil on paper, the sound of pigeons, and the delivery of inter-office correspondence by paper airplane. Wonderful!

definition.zh_def: 一種用於書寫或繪畫的工具，通常由木材或塑料製成，內含石墨或顏料。
definition.en_def: A writing or drawing instrument made of wood or plastic, containing graphite or pigment.
definition.example: She wrote her notes with a pencil.
